ModMetaData.name: Climate Cycle++
ModMetaData.author: Mehni
ModMetaData.description:
A run away climate cycle, seeking EXTREEEEEME weather.
version 1.0.2
<size=20>How to use</size>
Step 1. Install mod. Step 2. Activate in the scenario editor before starting a new colony.
<size=20>Credits and thanks:</size>
- ShotgunFrenzy and ramyb for the preview image. - Why_is_that for the SettingsHelper - www.twitch.tv/Spartyon7 for testing. - Dan, for rubber ducking :)
